mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_like (${inputColumnName}, ${receiveColumnName}, like_date, like_type) VALUES (#{inputId}, #{likeId}, NOW(), #{gubn})
mapper.select: SELECT tl.user_id, us.user_name, re.resume_no, re.job_history, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, us.user_birth, CURDATE()) - (RIGHT(CURDATE(), 5) < RIGHT (us.user_birth, 5)) AS user_age FROM tbl_like tl INNER JOIN tbl_user us ON tl.user_id = us.user_id INNER JOIN tbl_resume re ON us.user_id = re.user_id AND re.offer_yn = 'Y' WHERE tl.like_type = 'C' AND tl.company_id = #{company_id} ORDER BY tl.like_date desc
